pc-nrfconnect-ble.description: General tool for development and testing with Bluetooth Low Energy

pc-nrfconnect-rssi.description: Live visualization of RSSI per frequency for nRF52832

nrfcloud-gateway.description: nRF Cloud Gateway, connecting BLE to the cloud. This is an experimental app that may be deprecated.

pc-nrfconnect-ppk.description: Tool to measure current for nRF5x applications

pc-nrfconnect-programmer.description: Tool for flash programming of nRF SoCs
